snippet.title: Make an IMPOSSIBLE Game in 1 WEEK (or you can't do that) | Distress Signal (Unity Indie Game Devlog)
snippet.description:
Play Distress Signal Here: https://neenaw.itch.io/distress-signal
Wishlist Dino Dungeon: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1323930/Dino_Dungeon/

☕️ Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/neenaw
👾 Discord Server
https://discord.gg/CXwfVUD94u
🐦 Twitter
https://twitter.com/_neenaw
📸 Instagram 
https://instagram.com/neenaw
👕 Merch
http://teespring.com/stores/neenaw

Vimlarks Channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/vimlark

Tutorials I used to make this game:
Input System (SamYam) https://youtu.be/f0wax8LufqQ
Infinite Stars in Unity (quill18creates) https://youtu.be/nGw_UBJQPDY
Indicator System (TheGameGuy)https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pYEAwiKFKeg&ab_channel=TheGameGuy

#gamedev #gamejam #VimJam
Make an IMPOSSIBLE Game in 1 WEEK (or you can't do that) | Distress Signal (Unity Indie Game Devlog)
